task.summary: changed arc, tell me if you like it. Indicates better progress
created universal local clock! updates every 5 seconds
added current temp and current day
fixed list not showing background at launch
added pick a temperature in temperature picker
fixed schedule day and night temperature
made it easier to use the schedule. Just copy and paste stuff from the homepage if you want to use it in Day
I DONT FUCKING KNOW IT ANYMORE
disabled to listview entirely. Building a new one manually
recreated upcoming changes and made it actually work
probably fixed the nullpointexceptor in the upcoming changes
fixed not using schedule when opening app
added warning message if your screen is not the proper size :P
removed sources of images in upcoming changes, less buggy :P

MESSAGE.value: recreated upcoming changes and made it actually work
probably fixed the nullpointexceptor in the upcoming changes
fixed not using schedule when opening app
added warning message if your screen is not the proper size :P
